front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks--Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks--Amendment 16: Provider Bridging--Remote Customer Service Interfaces

abstract.t: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1 Q-2011 specifies the use of service virtual local area networks (S-VLANs) to provide customer service interfaces in one Provider Bridged Network for customer interface local area networks (LANs) attached to another Provider Bridged Network.
